item.title: 200V piezo crystal driver
item.description: Spoiler alert: I got the driving circuitry to behave as planned, but I could not feel the crystal vibrate. The idea is to use the tiny crystals used in piezoelectric motors to create an array of dots that can be made to vibrate under the area of a finger tip. This will be used to create a tactile display that can be felt. The initial aim would be an array of these crystals under an area the size of your fingertip.
